verses.verse: Hear, <WH8085> O Israel: <WH3478> You are to pass <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383> this day, <WH3117> to go <WH935> in to possess <WH3423> nations <WH1471> greater <WH1419> and mightier <WH6099> than yourself, cities <WH5892> great <WH1419> and fenced <WH1219> up to heaven, <WH8064>

A people <WH5971> great <WH1419> and tall, <WH7311> the children <WH1121> of the Anakims, <WH6062> whom <WH834> you know, <WH3045> and of whom <WH834> you have heard <WH8085> say, Who <WH4310> can stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Anak! <WH6061>

Understand <WH3045> therefore this day, <WH3117> that the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> is he which goes <WH5674> over <WH5674> before <WH6440> you; as a consuming <WH398> fire <WH784> he shall destroy <WH8045> them, and he shall bring <WH3665> them down <WH3665> before your face: so shall you drive <WH3423> them out, and destroy <WH6> them quickly, <WH4118> as the LORD <WH3068> has said <WH1696> to you.

Speak <WH559> not you in your heart, <WH3824> after that the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> has cast <WH1920> them out from before <WH6440> you, saying, <WH559> For my righteousness <WH6666> the LORD <WH3068> has brought <WH935> me in to possess <WH3423> this <WH2088> land: <WH776> but for the wickedness <WH7564> of these <WH428> nations <WH1471> the LORD <WH3068> does drive <WH3423> them out from before <WH6440> you.

Not for your righteousness, <WH6666> or for the uprightness <WH3476> of your heart, <WH3824> do you go <WH935> to possess <WH3423> their land: <WH776> but for the wickedness <WH7564> of these <WH428> nations <WH1471> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> does drive <WH3423> them out from before <WH6440> you, and that he may perform <WH6965> the word <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers, <WH1> Abraham, <WH85> Isaac, <WH3327> and Jacob. <WH3290>

Understand <WH3045> therefore, that the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives <WH5414> you not this <WH2063> good <WH2896> land <WH776> to possess <WH3423> it for your righteousness; <WH6666> for you are a stiff necked <WH7186> <WH6203> people. <WH5971>

Remember, <WH2142> and forget <WH7911> not, how <WH834> you provoked the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> to wrath <WH7107> in the wilderness: <WH4057> from the day <WH3117> that you did depart <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> until <WH5704> you came <WH935> to this <WH2088> place, <WH4725> you have been <WH1961> rebellious <WH4784> against <WH5973> the LORD. <WH3068>
Also in Horeb <WH2722> you provoked the LORD <WH3068> to wrath, <WH7107> so that the LORD <WH3068> was angry <WH599> with you to have destroyed <WH8045> you.

When I was gone <WH5927> up into the mount <WH2022> to receive <WH3947> the tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> even the tables <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> made <WH3772> with you, then I stayed <WH3427> in the mount <WH2022> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights, <WH3915> I neither <WH3808> did eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> nor <WH3808> drink <WH8354> water: <WH4325>

And the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> to me two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> written <WH3789> with the finger <WH676> of God; <WH430> and on <WH5921> them was written according to all <WH3605> the words, <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> with you in the mount <WH2022> out of the middle <WH8432> of the fire <WH784> in the day <WH3117> of the assembly. <WH6951>

And it came <WH1961> to pass at the end <WH7093> of forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights, <WH3915> that the LORD <WH3068> gave <WH5414> me the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> even the tables <WH3871> of the covenant. <WH1285>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, Arise, <WH6965> get <WH3381> you down <WH3381> quickly <WH4118> from hence; <WH2088> for your people <WH5971> which you have brought <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714> have corrupted <WH7843> themselves; they are quickly <WH4118> turned <WH5493> aside out of the way <WH1870> which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> them; they have made <WH6213> them a molten <WH4541> image.
Furthermore the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to me, saying, <WH559> I have seen <WH7200> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> and, behold, <WH2009> it is a stiff necked <WH7186> <WH6203> people: <WH5971>

Let me alone, <WH7503> that I may destroy <WH8045> them, and blot <WH4229> out their name <WH8034> from under <WH8478> heaven: <WH8064> and I will make <WH6213> of you a nation <WH1471> mightier <WH6099> and greater <WH7227> than they.

So I turned <WH6437> and came <WH3381> down <WH3381> from the mount, <WH2022> and the mount <WH2022> burned <WH1197> with fire: <WH784> and the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> were in my two <WH8147> hands. <WH3027>

And I looked, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> you had sinned <WH2398> against the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and had made <WH6213> you a molten <WH4541> calf: <WH5695> you had turned <WH5493> aside quickly <WH4118> out of the way <WH1870> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> you.
And I took <WH8610> the two <WH8147> tables, <WH3871> and cast <WH7993> them out of my two <WH8147> hands, <WH3027> and broke <WH7665> them before your eyes. <WH5869>

And I fell <WH5307> down before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> as at the first, <WH7223> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights: <WH3915> I did neither <WH3808> eat <WH398> bread, <WH3899> nor <WH3808> drink <WH8354> water, <WH4325> because <WH5921> of all <WH3605> your sins <WH2403> which <WH834> you sinned, <WH2398> in doing <WH6213> wickedly <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD, <WH3068> to provoke him to anger. <WH3707>

For I was afraid <WH3025> of the anger <WH639> and hot <WH2534> displeasure, <WH2534> with which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> was wroth <WH7107> against <WH5921> you to destroy <WH8045> you. But the LORD <WH3068> listened <WH8085> to me at that time <WH6471> also. <WH1571>
And the LORD <WH3068> was very <WH3966> angry <WH599> with Aaron <WH175> to have destroyed <WH8045> him: and I prayed <WH6419> for Aaron <WH175> also <WH1571> the same <WH1931> time. <WH6256>

And I took <WH3947> your sin, <WH2403> the calf <WH5695> which <WH834> you had made, <WH6213> and burnt <WH8313> it with fire, <WH784> and stamped <WH3807> it, and ground <WH2912> it very <WH3190> small, <WH3190> even until <WH5704> it was as small <WH1854> as dust: <WH6083> and I cast <WH7993> the dust <WH6083> thereof into <WH413> the brook <WH5158> that descended <WH3381> out of the mount. <WH2022>
And at Taberah, <WH8404> and at Massah, <WH4532> and at Kibrothhattaavah, <WH6914> you provoked the LORD <WH3068> to wrath. <WH7107>

Likewise when the LORD <WH3068> sent <WH7971> you from Kadeshbarnea, <WH6947> saying, <WH559> Go <WH5927> up and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> you; then you rebelled <WH4784> against the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and you believed <WH539> him not, nor <WH3808> listened <WH8085> to his voice. <WH6963>
You have been <WH1961> rebellious <WH4784> against <WH5973> the LORD <WH3068> from the day <WH3117> that I knew <WH3045> you.

Thus I fell <WH5307> down before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights, <WH3915> as I fell <WH5307> down at the first; because <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> had said <WH559> he would destroy <WH8045> you.

I prayed <WH6419> therefore to the LORD, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> O Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> destroy <WH7843> not your people <WH5971> and your inheritance, <WH5159> which <WH834> you have redeemed <WH6299> through your greatness, <WH1433> which <WH834> you have brought <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand. <WH3027>

Remember <WH2142> your servants, <WH5650> Abraham, <WH85> Isaac, <WH3327> and Jacob; <WH3290> look <WH6437> not to the stubbornness <WH7190> of this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> nor to their wickedness, <WH7562> nor to their sin: <WH2403>

Lest <WH6435> the land <WH776> from where <WH834> <WH8033> you brought <WH3318> us out say, <WH559> Because the LORD <WH3068> was not able <WH3201> to bring <WH935> them into <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> he promised <WH1696> them, and because he hated <WH8135> them, he has brought <WH3318> them out to slay <WH4191> them in the wilderness. <WH4057>
Yet they are your people <WH5971> and your inheritance, <WH5159> which <WH834> you brought <WH3318> out by your mighty <WH1419> power <WH3581> and by your stretched <WH5186> out arm. <WH2220>
